# beginr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `beginr` is to make it a bit easier to learn R.
It provides convenience functions and example datasets to make some common tasks a bit easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `beginr` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mjgreen/beginr")
```
